payload.Name: International Business Machines
payload.Description: International Business Machines Corporation (IBM) is a premier multinational technology firm headquartered in Armonk, New York, operating in over 170 countries. Established in 1911, IBM has solidified its position as a leader in innovation, particularly in artificial intelligence, quantum computing, and cloud computing services. With a long-standing commitment to research and development, IBM has set the record for the most U.S. patents granted for 28 consecutive years, reflecting its status as a trailblazer in the technology sector. The company's historical contributions, including the development of the ATM and relational database systems, highlight its legacy of impactful advancements, while its continuous evolution ensures it meets the complex demands of a rapidly changing digital landscape.
payload.Address: ONE NEW ORCHARD ROAD, ARMONK, NY, UNITED STATES, 10504
